whyWeAreHere.title: Why We Are Here

features.title: Critical Propositions
features.subtitle: Dim Sum AI Lab is deeply dedicated to exploring a series of critical propositions.

corpus.title: Corpus Development
corpus.description: How to develop annotation standards to efficiently build a large-scale Autonomous Multimodal Cantonese Corpus?

ecosystem.title: Application Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: How to design an access mechanism to create the Yue App Store and a versatile Cantonese application ecosystem based on the Cantonese corpus?

search.title: Search Engine Innovation
search.description: How to improve search algorithms to develop a next-generation AI-friendly search engine based on the Cantonese corpus?

saas.title: AI SaaS Framework
saas.description: How to innovate service models to create a next-generation AI SaaS framework based on the Cantonese corpus?

community.title: Community Building
community.description: How to foster an open-source community to build a next-generation global community of builders and researchers (DAO for Builders & Researchers) around the Cantonese corpus?
